"Get Powerful Equipment With Collection:
"If you want to obtain powerful ★13 or higher equipment, and you don't want to rely on enemy drops, you can use a Collection File.

First, go to the Quest Counter on the right. Then, talk to Pudding, select \"Collection File\", and choose the equipment you want.

If you collect all the \"Required items\", you will be given the item you selected.

※This tutorial will be displayed repeatedly until you acquire a Collection File."
